mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(resume_no) FROM tbl_aplc_hstr WHERE job_post_no = #{jobPostNo} AND resume_no IN (SELECT resume_no FROM tbl_resume WHERE user_id = #{userId})

SELECT apply.job_post_no, re.resume_no, apply.aplc_hstr_date, apply.pass_yn, re.title AS resume_title, jp.company_id, company.company_name, jp.start_date AS job_post_startDate, jp.end_date AS job_post_endDate, jp.title AS job_post_title
FROM tbl_aplc_hstr apply RIGHT JOIN (SELECT resume_no, title FROM tbl_resume WHERE user_id = #{userId}) re ON apply.resume_no = re.resume_no LEFT JOIN tbl_job_post jp ON apply.job_post_no = jp.job_post_no LEFT JOIN tbl_company company ON jp.company_id = company.company_id ORDER BY aplc_hstr_date DESC

SELECT apply.job_post_no, re.resume_no, apply.aplc_hstr_date, apply.pass_yn, re.title AS resume_title, jp.company_id, company.company_name, jp.start_date AS job_post_startDate, jp.end_date AS job_post_endDate, jp.title AS job_post_title, us.user_id, us.user_name, re.job_history, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, us.user_birth, CURDATE()) - (RIGHT(CURDATE(), 5) < RIGHT (us.user_birth, 5)) AS user_age
FROM tbl_job_post jp LEFT JOIN tbl_aplc_hstr apply ON apply.job_post_no = jp.job_post_no LEFT JOIN tbl_company company ON jp.company_id = company.company_id LEFT JOIN tbl_resume re ON apply.resume_no = re.resume_no LEFT JOIN tbl_user us ON re.user_id = us.user_id WHERE jp.job_post_no = #{jobPostNo} AND us.user_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY apply.aplc_hstr_date DESC, CASE WHEN NULLIF(apply.pass_yn, '') = '' THEN 0 WHEN NULLIF(apply.pass_yn, '') = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN NULLIF(apply.pass_yn, '') = 'N' THEN 2 END
